channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2024020625
item.description:
Report X-2024020625

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-22T15:12:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This package was visibly wet and smelt like Gasoline. Upon further inspection there was no inner packaging, and the metal can was filled too much causing the gasoline to leak out. DescribePack: Metal container was too filled causing the gasoline to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Spill Pads and Spill tote

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 01/24/2024, this shipment containing hidden dangerous goods was discovered during the shipment inspection process at the at the DHL RNO Service Center, 1395 Air Caro Way, Ste 114, Reno, NV 89502 Transportation by road has been confirmed.

item.title: Report X-2024020628
item.description:
Report X-2024020628

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-25
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: This package was visibly bleached due to the liquid. Upon further inspection there was no inner packaging, and the package was dropped causing the liquid to seep out of the cap and leak. DescribePack: Package was dropped causing leakage DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Spill pads and spill tote.
